trip_data._gas_volume_note: Gas volume per trip, based on capacity at Mother Station
trip_data._gas_price_note: Selling price to customer at Daughter Station
trip_data._gas_cost_note: Cost of gas at source Mother Station
trip_data._plant_cost_note: Plant operational costs allocated per scm
trip_data._ga_cost_note: General & Administrative costs allocated per scm
trip_data._truck_insurance_note: Combined interest + insurance costs per hour
trip_data._fuel_cost_note: Fuel consumption cost per hour (to be converted to per km in future)
trip_data._truck_turnaround_time_note: Total time from pickup to delivery and back to pickup (sensor-tracked)
trip_data._fixed_trucking_cost_note: Contractor fixed cost per km (varies by contractor: Diadem vs IMI)
trip_data._variable_trucking_cost_note: Additional variable cost per km beyond thresholds
trip_data._round_trip_distance_note: Total distance: Mother Station → Daughter Station → Mother Station (sensor-tracked)
trip_data._skid_turnaround_time_note: Total skid turnaround time (currently manual, transitioning to sensor)

_instructions.how_to_use: Modify the values above to test different scenarios
workflow: 2. Run the Python script: python profitability_calculator.py
3. Review the calculated profit and cost breakdown
4. For multiple scenario comparison, use scenarios.json
important_notes: All monetary values are in Nigerian Naira (NGN)
Gas volumes are in standard cubic meters (scm)
Future improvements will replace some manual inputs with sensor data
